select c.num,c.rank,d.total from (select openId,count(distinct(openId)) as total from cheer_assistance where create_time between #{1} and #{2})d, (select a.openId,a.num,(@rowNum:=@rowNum+1) as rank from (select openId,sum(assistance) as num from cheer_assistance where create_time between #{1} and #{2} group By openId )a, (Select (@rowNum :=0) ) b order by num desc) c where c.openId =#{0}
